meanings.definition: A documentary film or television program.
meanings.sent1: I watched a fascinating doco about penguins in Antarctica.
meanings.sent2: The doco on climate change was eye-opening.
meanings.sent3: The doco on bees was both informative and entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a doco, with every moment captured on film.
meanings.sent5: The doco on space exploration left a lasting impression on me.

meanings.sent1: Please bring all the necessary docos for the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The doco you need to sign is on the desk.
meanings.sent3: I can't find the doco for the insurance claim.
meanings.sent4: The ancient doco revealed secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: Make sure to keep your important docos in a safe place.

meanings.sent1: I need to doco all the expenses for the project.
meanings.sent2: She likes to doco her travels with photos.
meanings.sent3: Don't forget to doco the customer feedback.
meanings.sent4: His journal docos his daily experiences.
meanings.sent5: The historian will doco the event for future generations.
